comment: Dr. Montgomery is great and one of the best professors I have had. I loved the class and it was always fun and entertaining. Three major projects and some smaller things to do but overall such a fun class with a fun professor.

Dr. Montgomery is extremely intelligent. He gives good advice about teaching, and I can tell that he really has a passion for English and teaching. Dr. Montgomery gives a lot of projects, and his feedback has been somewhat harsh. Some of his grading seems to be inconsistent when talking to my peers in the class. I feel as though he grades harshly.

this was definitely one of my more difficult ENED classes, but dr. montgomery is great! there is a pretty heavy work load and we read six (yes, six) YA novels, but he made it so fun! his "lectures" are great and keep you entertained, and it was also really nice to have him so accessible in terms of advising. i highly recommend!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Prof. Montgomery is the best prof. I have had in my 3 years. He truly cares about his students and teaches content you will use in the classroom. There were a lot of projects, but no tests/quizzes. He cares a lot about attendance so be respectful and show up to class if you take him. 100000/10 recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: I have had so many professors take the easy way out during covid and just provide you with the bare minimum. Robert Montgomery is not one of those professors. I have learned more in one of his classes than in all of my other EDUC courses combined. His class isn't easy, but it is always fair and always well taught.

I have been lucky enough to have him for over 2 years by now, and every class he seems to become better. In light of the pandemic, he went as far as to give us his number if we need him. It's unlikely that you'll find a prof. that cares as much as he does, he's your biggest fan, and always eager to help. I could go on, but there's a text limit.

Dr. Montgomery made a nearly three-hour-long class engaging and interesting. He's also very personable and cares that his students do well. He's an easy grader for most of the assignments and it's unlikely that you'll get a C or lower in the class. However, he doesn't always give grades and feedback in a timely manner.
rating_tags: Caring--Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: One of the best professors I have ever taken!! He is very caring and genuine, and you can tell that he's really passionate about his job. He made me really excited to teach and he gives REALLY good advice about teaching too! I 100% recommend him.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. Montgomery has been awesome. He lets you branch out without having to worry about getting a bad grade because of it. I really enjoyed his class and his teaching style. My only complaint is commentaries tend to get really repetitive and boring after the first few weeks.

My first time taking Dr. Montgomery and I would recommend him to everyone. He knows what he's talking about and is very clear on what he wants out of projects and papers. I took him for Teaching Young Adult Lit, and he really made me excited to teach. He does a lot of group work, writing and class participation. You really can't miss class.

Great professor, at first I dreaded taking this class.  He is open and easy to approach.  Makes you want to teach English and open up in your writing.  Wish I could take him for all my ENG/EDUC classes.  But don't take his kindness for weakness. He may be quite, but he is watching your every move.
What a great class!  The projects were awsome, lots of class discussion, and interesting topics.  Great teacher, I learned a lot from his instruction!
I really enjoyed Dr. Montgomery's class. With it being an 8:00 AM class, he made it easy to stay awake. Very nice and a great teacher.

Yes, this class is hard but worth every minute. It's work with a purpose. Dr. Montgomery is a fabulous teacher and really puts as much effort into the class as he expects out of it. I would take this class again and again and again!
